trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> implementação para que possa utilizar o padrão "serviço de escuta de eventos fracos" para ligar os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
trans-unit.target: Para poder estar escuta neste padrão, os objetos do serviço de escuta tem de implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário implementar <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>na classe que é a origem dos eventos.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding uses this <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager> so that internal classes that update bindings can attach listeners for a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> event on an object that is the target of a binding.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]o enlace de dados utiliza este <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>para que as classes internas que atualizar enlaces do podem anexar os serviços de escuta para um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>evento de um objeto que é o destino de um enlace.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager>

trans-unit.source: This supports notification for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> mode of data binding, without creating strong references to data binding targets.
trans-unit.target: Este suporte a notificação para o <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>modo do enlace de dados, sem criar forte referências a destinos de enlace de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o processador de eventos especificado, o que é chamado quando a origem especificada gera o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> event..
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para especificar o processador de eventos que pretende utilizar para subscrever o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>eventos..</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> interface.
trans-unit.target: Quando utiliza este método, o objeto de serviço de escuta não necessita de implementar o <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>interface.</xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Adds the provided listener to the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço de escuta fornecido à lista de serviços de escuta de origem fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: The object to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a adicionar como um serviço de escuta.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um novo objeto que contém os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto que contém os serviços de escuta para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o processador de eventos especificado da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: handler is .
trans-unit.target: handleris .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified listener from the list of listeners on the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o serviço de escuta especificado na lista de serviços de escuta de origem fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove the listener from.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para remover o serviço de escuta do.

trans-unit.source: The listener to remove.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de escuta para remover.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event on the given source, attaching an internal class handler to that source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> evento de origem especificada, anexar um processador de classe interna para que a origem.

trans-unit.source: The provided source is checked for type to see if it is <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> , and then adds the class handler for the appropriate event to that source.
trans-unit.target: A origem fornecida está marcada para o tipo ver se é <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>ou <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>, e, em seguida, adiciona o processador de classe para o evento adequado para que a origem.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The object on which to start listening for the pertinent <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual pretende iniciar a escuta para o pertinentes <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref> event on the given source.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a escutar o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref> evento a origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object on which to stop listening for <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem em que pretende parar de escutar <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostFocus"> </xref>.
